title: Next Patch is GG Yasuo
body:
-10% Crit Damage + Ninja Tabi + Randuin Omen 

There's your counterplay to Yasuo

replies.body: It's not nearly enough to prevent Yas from being a problem.
He already said that -10% from master + new randuins will have it.
Ok yasuo passive -10% mastery -10% ninja tabu -10% randuins -10% there you go now you dont't have to do the math.
Oh but that barely even counts because it is like that from is double crit chance, so hes out putting more damage in the first place.

Well not as much before new randuins and by interpreting his thread came to the conclusion since new randuins is coming out but armour is getting nerf but a new effect made the conclusion that he is talking about crit damage.
